rooms.description: Open-plan living area combined with kitchen. Features natural lighting and Bohemian decor with vibrant colors, exposed brick walls and rustic wooden accents.
Spacious bedroom designed in a Bohemian style with an emphasis on comfort and aesthetic appeal. Includes a built-in wardrobe and ample storage solutions.
Compact yet functional bathroom integrated within the ground floor layout ensuring Vastu compliance by positioning it appropriately.
